sourcesContent: import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import {MatSidenav} from "@angular/material/sidenav"; import {GetDataService} from "./service/get-data.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { isMobile = true; title = 'AEPractice'; @ViewChild("sidenav") sidenav?: MatSidenav; constructor(private service:GetDataService) { console.log("service----", service); } }
